description: collection of videos uploaded by oriane app users for search purposes. No embeddings are created for this collection, instead, the frames are stored in the user_frames collection.

payload_indexes.description: deterministic uuid creatred from: user_id + upload_timestamp + vid/<filename>.<extension>
FK: oriane app user's random uuid

payload_data.description: path to the video in oriane-app/<user_id>/vid/<video_id>.mp4 S3 bucket. TODO: change to CDN url once implemented
duration of the video in seconds
size of the video in bytes
number of frames extracted from the video
